title: Closing stock prices for Akef Inc. on Wednesday
summary: The chart shows the Closing Stock Price for Akef Inc. on each Day of the Week , excluding weekends .
It shows that the Closing Stock Price was just above £ 50 on Monday , just above £ 60 on Tuesday and around £ 75 on Wednesday .
The Closing Stock Price then drops to just above £ 20 on Thursday and again to just under £ 10 on Friday .
gold: This graph compares the closing stock prices in GBP for Akef Inc on different days of the week . The highest closing stock price is on a Wednesday which is around 74 pound . The lowest closing stock price is on a friday with the price being around 10 pound .
